title: Streaky Bone Spike
content:
Streaky Bone Spike is an item collected with the Gatherer profession. A Hand Rake is required to harvest. Players receive 106 xp in Gatherer.

Used with the B.R.E.W.S. Vat to create a reagent used in most early recipes in the Bonewright profession. Can be bought and sold at Jangle's Bone Shop.

Stored in the Bones Bank, currently found in Overgrown Trail and Crystal Clearing in Hopeforest
